translation.en: Hello. My name's Forrest, Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 你好 我叫弗勒斯 姓甘

translation.en: Do you want a chocolate?
translation.zh: 要吃巧克力吗？

translation.en: I could eat about a million-and-a-half of these.
translation.zh: 这玩意我可以吃150万粒

translation.en: My mama always said,
translation.zh: 我妈常说

translation.en: "Life was like a box of chocolates."
translation.zh: “生命就如同一盒巧克力…

translation.en: You never know what you're gonna get.
translation.zh: 你永远不会知道你将得到什么”

translation.en: Those must be comfortable shoes.
translation.zh: 你穿的那双鞋一定很舒服

translation.en: I bet you could walk all day in shoes like that and not feel a thing.
translation.zh: 你即便走一整天也不会觉得痛

translation.en: I wish I had shoes like that.
translation.zh: 真希望我也有一双

translation.en: My feet hurt.
translation.zh: 我的脚经常痛

translation.en: [munches] Mama always said "There's an awful lot you can tell about a person by their shoes."
translation.zh: 我妈说 从鞋子看人 能看出很多东西

translation.en: Where they're going, where they've been.
translation.zh: 比如他们要上哪去 去过哪里

translation.en: I've worn lots of shoes.
translation.zh: 我穿烂过许多鞋

translation.en: I bet if I think about it real hard I could remember my first pair of shoes.
translation.zh: 我若是拼命的想 也能想起我的第一双鞋

translation.en: Mama said they'd take me anywhere.
translation.zh: 我妈说那双鞋 会带我走遍天下

translation.en: She said they was my magic shoes.
translation.zh: 她说那是我的“宝鞋”

translation.en: All right, Forrest, you can open your eyes now.
translation.zh: 好 弗勒斯 可以睁开眼睛了

translation.en: Let's take a little walk around.
translation.zh: 我们来走走看！

translation.en: How do those feel?
translation.zh: 感觉怎么样？

translation.en: His legs are strong, Mrs. Gump, as strong as I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 甘太太 他这双腿很强健 没见过这么有力的腿

translation.en: But his back's as crooked as a politician.
translation.zh: 但是他的背跟政客一样弯曲

translation.en: But we're going to straighten him right up now, aren't we, Forrest?
translation.zh: 不过我们会矫正的 对吧 弗勒斯？

translation.en: -[thuds] -Forrest!
translation.zh: 弗勒斯

translation.en: [Forrest] Now, when I was a baby, Mama named me
translation.zh: 我还是婴儿时 我妈用南北战争的英雄…

translation.en: after the great Civil War hero General Nathan Bedford Forrest.
translation.zh: 我妈用南北战争的英雄… 弗勒斯将军的姓氏 给我起名字

translation.en: -[piano music playing] -[Forrest] She said we was related to him
translation.zh: 她说我们和他有点亲戚关系

translation.en: in some way. And what he did was,
translation.zh: 她说我们和他有点亲戚关系 他创立所谓的三Ｋ党

translation.en: he started up this club called the Ku Klux Klan.
translation.zh: 他创立所谓的三Ｋ党

translation.en: They'd all dress up in their robes and their bedsheets
translation.zh: 他们都穿白袍或披床单

translation.en: and act like a bunch of ghosts or spooks or somethin'.
translation.zh: 看起来像幽灵鬼魅

translation.en: They'd even put bedsheets on their horses and ride around.
translation.zh: 他们甚至会给他们骑的马披上白床单

translation.en: And, anyway, that's how I got my name, Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 总之“弗勒斯”这个名字 是这样来的

translation.en: Mama said that the Forrest part was to remind me
translation.zh: 我妈说叫我弗勒斯 是为了要提醒我…

translation.en: that sometimes we all do things that, well, just don't make no sense.
translation.zh: 有时候人都会做些 没道理的事

translation.en: Just wait, let me get it.
translation.zh: 等一下 我来弄 让我来

translation.en: Give it to me.
translation.zh: 让我来

translation.en: Wait, is it this way? Hold on. [grunts]
translation.zh: 等一下 要这样子 抓紧…

translation.en: [grunts] All right.
translation.zh: 好了！

translation.en: What are y'all starin' at?
translation.zh: 你们看什么看？

translation.en: Haven't you ever seen a little boy with braces on his legs before?
translation.zh: 没见过男孩子戴腿箍吗？

translation.en: Don't ever let anybody tell you they're better than you, Forrest.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 别让人家说他比你强

translation.en: If God intended everybody to be the same, he'd have given us all braces on our legs.
translation.zh: 如果上帝的旨意是要人人平等 他会给我们所有人腿箍

translation.en: [Forrest] Mama always had a way of explaining things so I could understand them.
translation.zh: 妈对事情总是有办法 解释得让我明白

translation.en: We lived about a quarter mile off Route 17,
translation.zh: 我们家离17号公路四百米

translation.en: about a half mile from the town of Greenbow, Alabama.
translation.zh: 离阿拉巴马州的格林鲍镇 大概八百米

translation.en: That's in the county of Greenbow.
translation.zh: 那个镇位于格林鲍县

translation.en: Our house had been in Mama's family since her grandpa's grandpa's grandpa
translation.zh: 我们的房子 打从我妈祖父的祖父的祖父

translation.en: had come across the ocean about a 1000 years ago
translation.zh: 一千年前飘洋来定居就有了

translation.en: or somethin' like that.
translation.zh: 好像是这样

translation.en: Since it was just me and Mama and we had all these empty rooms,
translation.zh: 大宅里只有妈和我 空房间很多

translation.en: Mama decided to let those rooms out, mostly to people passing through,
translation.zh: 妈决定把空房间出租 多半租给过路客

translation.en: like from, oh, Mobile, Montgomery, places like that.
translation.zh: 譬如来自莫比尔 蒙哥马利镇之类的过客

translation.en: And that's how me and Mama got money.
translation.zh: 妈和我的收入就靠租金了

translation.en: Mama was a real smart lady.
translation.zh: 妈真的很精明

translation.en: [Mrs. Gump] Remember what I told you, Forrest.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 记住我的话

translation.en: You're no different than anybody else is.
translation.zh: 你跟别人没有两样

translation.en: Did you hear what I said, Forrest?
translation.zh: 你听见没有？

translation.en: You're the same as everybody else. You are no different.
translation.zh: 你跟别人一样 没什么不同

translation.en: Your boy's… different, Mrs. Gump.
translation.zh: 你的儿子… 跟别人不一样 甘太太

translation.en: Now, his I.Q. is 75.
translation.zh: 他的智商是75

translation.en: Well, we're all different, Mr. Hancock.
translation.zh: 韩谷校长 我们每个人都不大一样

translation.en: [Forrest] She wanted me to have the finest education, so she took me
translation.zh: 她要我接受最好的教育 于是送我去读格林鲍县中央中学

translation.en: to the Greenbow County Central School.
translation.zh: 于是送我去读格林鲍县中央中学

translation.en: I met the principal and all.
translation.zh: 我见到了校长和其他一些教员

translation.en: [Mr. Hancock] I want to show you something, Mrs. Gump.
translation.zh: 甘太太 你看

translation.en: Now, this is normal.
translation.zh: 这个是正常的

translation.en: Forrest is right here.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯只到这里

translation.en: The state requires a minimum I.Q. of 80 to attend public school, Mrs. Gump.
translation.zh: 公立学校规定智商要在80以上

translation.en: He's gonna have to go to a special school.
translation.zh: 他必须得上特殊学校

translation.en: Now, he'll be just fine.
translation.zh: 在那边他会很好

translation.en: What does normal mean anyway? He might be…
translation.zh: 正常的定义都是什么呢？ 他也许迟钝一点

translation.en: a bit on the slow side…
translation.zh: 他也许迟钝一点

translation.en: but my boy Forrest is gonna get the same opportunities as everyone else.
translation.zh: 但是我家弗勒斯… 要跟别人一样有均等机会

translation.en: He's not going to some special school to learn how to retread tires.
translation.zh: 他不会上什么智障学校 去学怎么拆换轮胎

translation.en: We're talking about five little points here.
translation.zh: 只差五分而已

translation.en: There must be something that can be done.
translation.zh: 一定有办法补救的

translation.en: [chuckles] We're a progressive school system.
translation.zh: 本校是进步教育制度

translation.en: We don't want to see anybody left behind.
translation.zh: 不愿见到有人落后

translation.en: Is there a Mr. Gump, Mrs. Gump?
translation.zh: 甘太太 您先生在吗？

translation.en: He's on vacation.
translation.zh: 他去度假了！

translation.en: Well, your mama sure does care about your schooling, son.
translation.zh: 孩子 你母亲很关心你的学业

translation.en: You don't say much, do you?
translation.zh: 你不爱说话 是吗？

translation.en: "Finally, he had to try. It looked easy, but…"
translation.zh: “到后来他必须试试看… 这看起来容易 首先…”

translation.en: -"Oh, what happened. First, they--" -Mama, what's vacation mean?
translation.zh: 这看起来容易 首先…” 妈 “度假”是什么意思？

translation.en: -Vacation? -Where Daddy went?
translation.zh: 度假？ 爸爸上哪去了？

translation.en: Vacation's when you go somewhere… and you don't ever come back.
translation.zh: 度假就是去别的地方 一去不回

translation.en: [Forrest] Anyway, I guess you could say me and Mama was on our own.
translation.zh: 反正就只有妈和我相依为命

translation.en: But we didn't mind.
translation.zh: 但我们并不在意

translation.en: Our house was never empty. There was always folks coming and going.
translation.zh: 因为家里人来人往 从没有空过

translation.en: -Supper! It's supper, everyone! Forrest! -My, my, that sure looks special.
translation.zh:
-大家快来吃饭 弗勒斯
-那看起来真香

translation.en: [Forrest] Sometimes we had so many people staying with us
translation.zh: 有时候客人很多

translation.en: that every room was filled with travelers, you know,
translation.zh: 每个房间都住满了 都是些跑码头的 做推销的…

translation.en: -folks living out of their suitcases… -[Mrs. Gump] Well, you go ahead and start.
translation.zh: 都是些跑码头的 做推销的…

translation.en: -and hat cases, and sample cases. -I can't find Forrest. Forrest!
translation.zh: 以旅行为生的人

translation.en: Forrest Gump, it's suppertime! Forrest?
translation.zh: 阿甘！吃晚饭了！弗勒斯？ 弗勒斯！

translation.en: [Forrest] One time, a young man was staying with us,
translation.zh: 有一次有个年轻人投宿

translation.en: and he had him a guitar case.
translation.zh: 他带着一个吉他箱

translation.en: [Elvis] ♪ Well, you ain't never caught a rabbit ♪
translation.zh: 你从来没捉到兔子

translation.en: ♪ And you ain't no friend of mine ♪
translation.zh: 你不是我的朋友

translation.en: Forrest.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯

translation.en: I told you not to bother this nice, young man.
translation.zh: 我叫你不要打扰这个小伙子

translation.en: [Elvis] Oh, no, that's all right, ma'am.
translation.zh: 不要紧 夫人

translation.en: I… I was showing him a thing or two on the guitar here.
translation.zh: 我只是弹两下给他看

translation.en: Well, all right then. Supper's ready if y'all want to eat.
translation.zh: 好 不过晚饭好了 要吃赶快

translation.en: [Elvis] Yeah, that sounds good. Thank you, ma'am.
translation.zh: 那好 谢谢甘太太！

translation.en: Say, man, show me that crazy little walk you just did there.
translation.zh: 小兄弟 刚才的怪舞步再做一遍

translation.en: Slow it down, son.
translation.zh: 做慢一点

translation.en: ♪ You ain't nothing but a… ♪
translation.zh: 你只不过是一只…猎犬

translation.en: -[Forrest] I liked that guitar. -♪ And you know it ♪ [Forrest] It sounded good.
translation.zh: 我喜欢那把吉他 很好听

translation.en: I started moving around to the music, swinging my hips.
translation.zh: 我开始扭着屁股走向那歌声

translation.en: [Forrest] This one night, me and Mama was out shoppin',
translation.zh: 那一夜我和妈去购物

translation.en: and we walked by Vincy's furniture and appliance store, and guess what?
translation.zh: 走过班森家具电器行 你猜怎么着了？

translation.en: -♪ You ain't nothin' but a hound dog ♪ -[crowd laughing]
translation.zh: 你只不过是一只…猎犬

translation.en: ♪ Cryin' all the time ♪
translation.zh: 整天叫不停

translation.en: -♪ You ain't nothin' but a hound dog ♪ -This is not for children's eyes.
translation.zh: 你只不过是一只…猎犬 这不是给小孩看的

translation.en: [Elvis] ♪ Cryin' all the time ♪
translation.zh: 整天叫不停

translation.en: [Forrest] Some years later, that handsome young man who they called the King…
translation.zh: 若干年以后 那个年轻英俊的被称作猫王的

translation.en: well, he sung too many songs.
translation.zh: 他唱了太多太多的歌

translation.en: Had himself a heart attack or something.
translation.zh: 于是他心脏病还是什么病发作了

translation.en: It must be hard bein' a king.
translation.zh: 什么“王”一定很不好当

translation.en: You know, it's funny how you remember some things, but some things you can't.
translation.zh: 说也奇怪 有些事记得 有些却想不起了

translation.en: You do your very best now, Forrest.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 你要尽全力

translation.en: -I sure will, Mama. -[tires squeal]
translation.zh: 我一定会的！

translation.en: [Forrest] I remember the bus ride on the first day of school very well.
translation.zh: 我记得第一天坐校车去上学 很清楚记得

translation.en: Are you coming along?
translation.zh: 你要不要上车？

translation.en: Mama said not to be taking rides from strangers.
translation.zh: 妈说不可以坐陌生人的车

translation.en: This is the bus to school.
translation.zh: 这是上学的校车

translation.en: I'm Forrest, Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 我叫弗勒斯 姓甘！

translation.en: -I'm Dorothy Harris. -Well, now we ain't strangers anymore.
translation.zh: 我是桃乐茜哈里斯 现在你不是陌生人了

translation.en: This seat's taken.
translation.zh: 这位子有人

translation.en: It's taken.
translation.zh: 有人坐！

translation.en: You can't sit here.
translation.zh: 你不能坐这里！

translation.en: [Forrest] You know, it's funny what a young man recollects,
translation.zh: 说也奇怪 年轻人记忆真差

translation.en: 'cause I don't remember being born.
translation.zh: 我居然想不起我出生过

translation.en: I… I don't recall what I got for my first Christmas,
translation.zh: 我…我想不起 第一份圣诞礼物

translation.en: and I don't know when I went on my first outdoor picnic but…
translation.zh: 也记不起头一次野餐是何时

translation.en: I do remember the first time I heard the sweetest voice in the wide world.
translation.zh: 却记得第一次听到 最美的声音

translation.en: [young Jenny] You can sit here if you want.
translation.zh: 你要是愿意可以坐在这里

translation.en: -[orchestral music playing] -[Forrest] I had never seen anything so beautiful in my life.
translation.zh: 我从没见过这么美丽的东西

translation.en: She was like an angel.
translation.zh: 她像天使一样美

translation.en: Well, are you gonna sit down, or aren't you?
translation.zh: 怎样？你到底要不要坐？

translation.en: What's wrong with your legs?
translation.zh: 你的腿怎么回事？

translation.en: Um, nothing at all, thank you. My legs are just fine and dandy.
translation.zh: 没事 谢谢你！ 我的腿好得很

translation.en: [Forrest] I just sat next to her on that bus and had a conversation all the way to school.
translation.zh: 我就跟她坐 一直聊到学校

translation.en: My mama says back's crooked like a question mark.
translation.zh: 我就跟她坐 一直聊到学校 我妈说我的背弓得像个问号

translation.en: These are gonna make me…
translation.zh: 这双鞋会使我挺直如箭

translation.en: [Forrest] And next to Mama, no one ever talked to me or asked me questions.
translation.zh: 除了我妈 从来没有人跟我讲话或问话

translation.en: Are you stupid or something?
translation.zh: 你是笨还是呆？

translation.en: Mama says, "Stupid is as stupid does."
translation.zh: 我妈说：“蠢人做蠢事”

translation.en: I'm Jenny.
translation.zh: 我叫珍妮

translation.en: I'm Forrest, Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 我叫弗勒斯 姓甘

translation.en: [Forrest] From that day on, we was always together. Jenny and me was like peas and carrots.
translation.zh: 从那天起我们总是在一起 就像秤不离砣

translation.en: [Forrest] She taught me how to climb.
translation.zh: 她教我爬树

translation.en: Come on, Forrest, you can do it!
translation.zh: 弗勒斯加油 你爬得上来

translation.en: [Forrest] I showed her how to dangle.
translation.zh: 我教她悬荡

translation.en: "A good little…"
translation.zh: “一只小乖猴子和…”

translation.en: [Forrest] She helped me learn how to read…
translation.zh: 她教我读书识字

translation.en: and I showed her how to swing.
translation.zh: 我教她倒挂摆荡

translation.en: Sometimes, we'd just sit out and wait for the stars.
translation.zh: 有时我们并肩而坐等星星出来

translation.en: [young Forrest] Mama's gonna worry about me.
translation.zh: 妈会担心我的

translation.en: Just stay a little longer.
translation.zh: 再坐一会

translation.en: [Forrest] For some reason, Jenny didn't never want to go home.
translation.zh: 珍妮为了某种理由不想回家

translation.en: Okay, Jenny, I'll stay.
translation.zh: 好 珍妮 我再待会

translation.en: [Forrest] She was my most special friend.
translation.zh: 她是我最特别的朋友

translation.en: My only friend.
translation.zh: 我唯一的朋友

translation.en: Now my mama always told me that miracles happen every day.
translation.zh: 我妈常说每天都有奇迹发生

translation.en: Some people don't think so, but they do.
translation.zh: 有人不以为然 但确有其事

translation.en: Hey, dummy!
translation.zh: 笨蛋！

translation.en: [boy 1] Are you retarded, or just plain stupid?
translation.zh: 你到底是笨还是低能？

translation.en: [boy 2] Look, I'm Forrest Gimp.
translation.zh: 我是弗勒斯甘

translation.en: [young Jenny] Just run away, Forrest.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 快逃！

translation.en: Run, Forrest! Run away! Hurry!
translation.zh: 快跑 弗勒斯！

translation.en: -Get the bikes! -[boy] Hurry up. Let's get him!
translation.zh: 上车追 快点！

translation.en: Come on! Look out, dummy. Here we come. We're going to get you!
translation.zh: 追他 快！ 笨蛋 当心我们来了！ 我们会追上你

translation.en: Run, Forrest, run! Run, Forrest!
translation.zh: 逃 弗勒斯 快跑！ 快跑 弗勒斯！

translation.en: Come back here, you!
translation.zh: 你给我回来！

translation.en: Run, Forrest! Run!
translation.zh: 跑 弗勒斯 快逃！

translation.en: [Forrest] Now you wouldn't believe it if I told you…
translation.zh: 我说出来你也许不会相信

translation.en: but I could run like the wind blows.
translation.zh: 我跑起来像风一样快

translation.en: From that day on, if I was going somewhere, I was running.
translation.zh: 从那天起我去哪儿都是跑步去

translation.en: That boy sure is a runnin' fool.
translation.zh: 那孩子真是跑步狂

translation.en: [Forrest] Now remember how I told you that Jenny never seemed to wanna go home?
translation.zh: 记得我说过珍妮从不想回家吗？

translation.en: Well, she lived in a house that was as old as Alabama.
translation.zh: 她家的房子跟阿拉巴马州一样老旧

translation.en: Her mama had gone up to heaven when she was five,
translation.zh: 她五岁时妈妈去了天堂

translation.en: and her daddy was some kind of a farmer.
translation.zh: 她爸爸是个农夫

translation.en: [young Forrest] Jenny?
translation.zh: 珍妮？

translation.en: [Forrest] He was a very loving man.
translation.zh: 他非常的慈爱

translation.en: [young Forrest] Jenny? [Forrest] He was always kissing and touchin' her and her sisters.
translation.zh: 常常抚摸和亲吻她们几个姐妹

translation.en: And then this one time, Jenny wasn't on the bus to go to school.
translation.zh: 有一次珍妮没坐校车去上学

translation.en: Jenny, why didn't you come to school today?
translation.zh: 珍妮 今天你怎么没去上学？

translation.en: Shh. Daddy's takin' a nap.
translation.zh: 我爸在午睡！

translation.en: -[thuds] -[Jenny's father] Jenny!
translation.zh: 珍妮！

translation.en: -Come on! -[thudding, clattering]
translation.zh: 快走！

translation.en: [Jenny's father] Jenny, where'd you run to?
translation.zh: 珍妮 你要往哪跑？

translation.en: You better get back here, girl!
translation.zh: 你给我回来 丫头！

translation.en: Where you at?
translation.zh: 你在哪里？

translation.en: [Jenny's father] Jenny! Jenny, where you at?
translation.zh: 珍妮…你在哪里？

translation.en: Jenny!
translation.zh: 珍妮！

translation.en: [young Jenny] Pray with me, Forrest. Pray with me.
translation.zh: 和我一起祷告 和我祷告！

translation.en: -[Jenny's father] Jenny! -[Jenny] Dear God, make me a bird
translation.zh: 珍妮！ 上帝 把我变成小鸟 我好飞得远远的

translation.en: so I can fly far, far, far away from here.
translation.zh: 上帝 把我变成小鸟 我好飞得远远的

translation.en: Dear God, make me a bird so I can fly far, -far, far from here. -[birds tweeting]
translation.zh: 上帝 把我变成小鸟 我好飞得远远的

translation.en: [Forrest] Mama always said that God is mysterious.
translation.zh: 妈总是说上帝是充满奥秘的

translation.en: -[Jenny's father] Jenny! -[Forrest] He didn't turn Jenny -into a bird that day. -[Jenny's father] You get back here!
translation.zh: 那天上帝并没有把珍妮变成鸟

translation.en: [Forrest] Instead… he had the police say Jenny didn't have to stay -in that house no more. -[dog snarls, barks]
translation.zh: 而是叫警察来带她离开了那屋子…

translation.en: [Forrest] She went to live with her grandma just over on Creekmore Avenue,
translation.zh: 去跟她外婆一起住在克里摩路

translation.en: which made me happy 'cause she was so close.
translation.zh: 我为此很高兴 因为那里离我家很近

translation.en: -[thunderclaps] -[Forrest] Some nights, Jenny'd sneak out
translation.zh: 有时候珍妮夜里会溜出来 跑去我家玩

translation.en: and come on over to my house just 'cause she said she was scared.
translation.zh: 她只是说她很怕

translation.en: -Scared of what, I don't know. -[door creaking]
translation.zh: 至于怕什么我不知道

translation.en: [Forrest] But I think it was her grandma's dog.
translation.zh: 我猜想是怕她外婆的狗

translation.en: He was a mean dog.
translation.zh: 那只公狗很凶

translation.en: Anyway, Jenny and me was best friends all the way up through high school.
translation.zh: 反正珍妮和我就是很好的朋友 直到高中也是如此

translation.en: -[boy] Hey, stupid! -Quit it!
translation.zh: 笨蛋！ 不要闹！

translation.en: -[boys laughing] -Run, Forrest, run!
translation.zh: 不要闹！ 快跑 弗勒斯 跑！

translation.en: -Hey! Did you hear me, stupid? -[hooting]
translation.zh: 听到没有 笨蛋！

translation.en: -[Jenny] Run, Forrest! -[boy] Come on, get in the truck!
translation.zh: 跑 弗勒斯！

translation.en: Get in the truck! Let's move it!
translation.zh: 快上车 上车！快点！

translation.en: Come on! He's getting away! Move it!
translation.zh: 快 他跑了！快点！

translation.en: Run, Forrest! Run!
translation.zh: 跑！弗勒斯！跑！

translation.en: -Move it, dumbass! -Yeah, you better be running!
translation.zh: 快跑 呆子！ 你最好不要停！

translation.en: Run, Forrest!
translation.zh: 跑 弗勒斯！

translation.en: Now, it used to be I ran to get where I was going.
translation.zh: 我到哪都是要跑着去

translation.en: I never thought it would take me anywhere.
translation.zh: 从未想到竟然会跑出名堂来

translation.en: Who in the hell is that?
translation.zh: 那是谁？

translation.en: That there is Forrest Gump, coach.
translation.zh: 教练 那是弗勒斯甘

translation.en: -Just a local idiot. -[pants]
translation.zh: 是镇上的白痴

translation.en: [Forrest] And can you believe it? I got to go to college, too.
translation.zh: 信不信由你 我居然也上了大学

translation.en: Forrest, move it! Run! Run! -Okay! -Run!
translation.zh: 弗勒斯…跑！

translation.en: Run, you stupid son of a bitch! Run!
translation.zh: 跑！你这混小子 跑！

translation.en: Run, son of a bitch, run! Go! Run!
translation.zh: 混小子 跑！

translation.en: Run! Run! Go!
translation.zh: 跑！转弯！跑！

translation.en: He must be the stupidest son of a bitch alive,
translation.zh: 他也许是最笨的混小子

translation.en: -but he sure is fast. [laughs] -Yeah! [laughs]
translation.zh: 但肯定是跑得最快的

translation.en: [Forrest] Now, maybe it's just me, but college was very confusing times.
translation.zh: 也许是我的问题 但总觉得大学越念越糊涂

translation.en: Federal troops enforcing a court order
translation.zh: 联邦政府派军队强制执行 法院命令

translation.en: integrated the University of Alabama today.
translation.zh: 使阿拉巴马大学黑人与白人同校

translation.en: Two negroes were admitted but only after Governor George Wallace
translation.zh: 两名黑人被录取 华里斯州长挡在校门口 做了象征性的示威

translation.en: had carried out his symbolic threat to stand in the schoolhouse door.
translation.zh: 华里斯州长挡在校门口 做了象征性的示威

translation.en: Governor Wallace, I take it from that, uh, statement that us…
translation.zh: 华里斯州长 你不服从法院命令

translation.en: Earl, what's going on?
translation.zh: 厄尔 怎么回事？

translation.en: -Coons are trying to get into school. -Coons?
translation.zh: “浣熊”也想要上学校了 浣熊？浣熊若跑上我们家后廊

translation.en: When raccoons tried getting on our back porch,
translation.zh: 浣熊？浣熊若跑上我们家后廊

translation.en: -Mama just chased them off with a broom. -Not raccoons, you idiot. Niggers.
translation.zh: 我妈就拿扫帚驱赶它们 笨蛋 不是真浣熊 是指黑人

translation.en: And they want to go to school with us.
translation.zh: 他们要跟我们一起上学

translation.en: With us? They do?
translation.zh: 跟我们同校？真的吗？

translation.en: [reporter] Shortly after Governor Wallace had carried out his promise
translation.zh: 华里斯州长如他所说挡住校门

translation.en: to block the doorway, President Kennedy ordered the Secretary of Defense
translation.zh: 华里斯州长如他所说挡住校门 肯尼迪总统令国防部长用武力

translation.en: then to use military force. Here, by videotape, is the encounter
translation.zh: 肯尼迪总统令国防部长用武力 国民兵司令葛拉汉将军…

translation.en: by General Graham, commander of the National Guard,
translation.zh: 国民兵司令葛拉汉将军… 与华里斯州长交锋

translation.en: and Governor Wallace.
translation.zh: 与华里斯州长交锋

translation.en: Because these national guardsmen
translation.zh: 因为代表联邦政府的国民兵…

translation.en: are here today as federal soldiers for Alabama,
translation.zh: 因为代表联邦政府的国民兵… 是本州的乡亲子弟

translation.en: and they live within our borders. They are all our brothers.
translation.zh: 是本州的乡亲子弟

translation.en: We are winning in this fight,
translation.zh: 这场抗争我们占上风

translation.en: because we are awakening the American people
translation.zh: 我们唤醒美国人

translation.en: to the dangers that we have spoken about so many times that is so evident today,
translation.zh: 认清我们曾多次强调的危机 今天明显的看到…

translation.en: the trend toward military dictatorship in this country.
translation.zh: 军方有独裁的倾向

translation.en: [reporter] And so at day's end, the University of Alabama in Tuscaloosa
translation.zh: 抗争一天后 阿拉巴马大学让步

translation.en: had been desegregated,
translation.zh: 开放给黑人

translation.en: and students Jimmy Hood and Vivian Malone had been signed up
translation.zh: 开放给黑人 吉米胡和费雯马龙获准入学

translation.en: -for summer classes. -[woman speaking indistinctly]
translation.zh: 吉米胡和费雯马龙获准入学

translation.en: [Forrest] Ma'am, you dropped your book. Ma'am--
translation.zh: 小姐 你的书掉了 小姐…

translation.en: [Chet] Governor Wallace did what he promised to do.
translation.zh: 华里斯州长照他的承诺…

translation.en: By being on the Tuscaloosa campus, he kept the mob from gathering…
translation.zh: 去校园阻止了暴徒聚集

translation.en: Say, wasn't that Gump?
translation.zh: 那不是阿甘吗？

translation.en: No, that couldn't be.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: It sure as hell was.
translation.zh: 天 就是他

translation.en: [Forrest] A few years later,
translation.zh: 几年之后

translation.en: that angry little man at the schoolhouse door
translation.zh: 挡校门的那个小怒汉

translation.en: thought it'd be a good idea and ran for president.
translation.zh: 觉得竞选总统是个好主意

translation.en: [Forrest] But somebody thought that it wasn't.
translation.zh: 可是也有人说不好

translation.en: -[vehicle approaching] -But he didn't die.
translation.zh: 不过他没死！

translation.en: My bus is here.
translation.zh: 我的巴士来了

translation.en: -Is it the number nine? -No, it's the number four.
translation.zh: 是不是九路车？ 不是 是四路车

translation.en: It was nice talking to you.
translation.zh: 和你谈话很愉快

translation.en: I remember when that happened,
translation.zh: 我记得华里斯遇刺时…

translation.en: when Wallace got shot. I was in college.
translation.zh: 我正在念大学

translation.en: Did you go to a girls' college or a girls' and boys' together college?
translation.zh: 你念女子大学还是男女混校？

translation.en: -It was coed. -'Cause Jenny went to a college
translation.zh:
-是男女混校
-珍妮上的大学我不能去

translation.en: I couldn't go to. It was a college just for girls.
translation.zh:
-是男女混校
-珍妮上的大学我不能去 那学校只收女生

translation.en: But I'd go and visit her every chance I got.
translation.zh: 不过我一有空就去看她

translation.en: ♪ I don't know why I love you but I do ♪
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么爱你 我就是爱你

translation.en: ♪ I don't know why I cry so but I do ♪
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么要哭 我就是要哭

translation.en: ♪ I only know I'm lonely ♪
translation.zh: 我只知道我只爱你一个

translation.en: -♪ And that I want you only ♪ -[Jenny groans] That hurts!
translation.zh: 我只知道我只爱你一个 好痛！

translation.en: ♪ I don't know why I love you, but I do ♪
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么爱你 我就是爱你

translation.en: -[thuds] -[Jenny] Forrest! Forrest! -[Billy groaning] -Forrest, stop it!
translation.zh: 弗勒斯！住手！

translation.en: Stop it! What are you doing?
translation.zh: 弗勒斯！住手！ 你在干什么？

translation.en: -He was hurting you. -What the hell is going on here?
translation.zh:
-干什么？
-他伤害你！

translation.en: -No, he wasn't! Get over there! -Who is that? Who is that?
translation.zh:
他没有伤害我！ -那是谁？
-比利 对不起！

translation.en: -Billy, I'm sorry. -Just get away from me.
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼？走开 给我走开

translation.en: -Don't be such… Don't go. -Get… get… get away from me!
translation.zh:
不要…等一下！ -走开 离我远一点！
-比利 别走 等等！

translation.en: Billy, wait a second.
translation.zh:
-走开 离我远一点！
-比利 别走 等等！

translation.en: -[engine starting] -He doesn't know any better.
translation.zh: 他不懂事！

translation.en: Forrest, why'd you do that?
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 为什么那样做？

translation.en: I brought you some chocolate. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我带巧克力来给你吃 对不起

translation.en: I'll go back to my college now.
translation.zh: 我要回学校去了

translation.en: Forrest-- Look at you.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 你看你

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: -Is this your own room? -Shh!
translation.zh: 这是你的房间？

translation.en: [Jenny] Do you ever dream, Forrest…
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 你可曾梦想…

translation.en: about who you're going to be?
translation.zh: 你将来会成为什么？

translation.en: Who I'm going to be?
translation.zh:
-我会成为什么？
-是

translation.en: -Yeah. -Aren't… aren't I going to be me?
translation.zh: 将来我不是我自己吗？

translation.en: You'll always be you, just another kind of you.
translation.zh: 你永远是你 只是另一种你

translation.en: You know? I want to be famous.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我要出名！

translation.en: I want to be a singer like Joan Baez.
translation.zh: 要做像琼贝兹一样出名的歌手

translation.en: I just want to be…
translation.zh: 我要在空荡的舞台上

translation.en: on an empty stage with my guitar, my voice.
translation.zh: 我要在空荡的舞台上 只有我的吉他声和我的歌声

translation.en: Just me.
translation.zh: 只有我

translation.en: And I want to reach people on a personal level.
translation.zh: 我要打动人心

translation.en: I want to be able to say things, just one to one.
translation.zh: 我要与人沟通 一对一的说话

translation.en: Have you ever been with a girl, Forrest?
translation.zh: 你有和女生在一起过吗？

translation.en: I sit next to them in my home economics class all the time.
translation.zh: 我修家政课时和女生坐一起

translation.en: -Oh, I'm sorry. Sorry. -[Jenny] It's okay.
translation.zh:
-对不起！
-不要紧

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: -[Jenny] It's okay. -Oh, I'm dizzy.
translation.zh: 没关系 我头晕！

translation.en: I'll bet that never happened in home ec.
translation.zh: 上家政课不会晕吧！

translation.en: -No. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: I think I ruined your roommate's bathrobe.
translation.zh: 我把你室友的睡袍弄坏了

translation.en: [whispers] I don't care. I don't like her anyway.
translation.zh: 无所谓 反正我不喜欢她

translation.en: [crowd cheering] Run! Run! Run! Run! Run! Run! Run! Run! Run! Run! Run! Run!
translation.zh: 跑！

translation.en: Run! Run! Run! Run! Run! Run! Stop!
translation.zh: 跑！ 停！

translation.en: [Forrest] College ran by real fast 'cause I played so much football.
translation.zh: 上大学要靠跑得快 我打了太多场球

translation.en: They even put me on a thing called the all-America team
translation.zh: 甚至入选全国大专明星队

translation.en: where you get to meet the President of the United States.
translation.zh: 得到总统召见

translation.en: [announcer] President Kennedy met with the collegiate
translation.zh: 今天肯尼迪总统在白宫…

translation.en: All-American football team at the Oval Office today.
translation.zh: 今天肯尼迪总统在白宫… 接见全国大专足球队明星

translation.en: [Forrest] Now the really good thing about meeting the president
translation.zh: 见总统的好处是…

translation.en: of the United States is the food.
translation.zh: 见总统的好处是… 有好菜吃！

translation.en: They put you in this little room with just about anything you'd want to eat or drink.
translation.zh: 他们请你到一个小厅 那里有你想吃的所有东西

translation.en: But since, number one, I wasn't hungry but thirsty,
translation.zh: 第一 由于我不饿只是渴

translation.en: and number two, they was free, I must have drank me about 15 Dr Peppers.
translation.zh: 第二 由于饮料免费 我大概喝了15瓶饮料

translation.en: [Kennedy] Congratulations! How does it feel to be an All-American?
translation.zh: 恭喜 入选明星队感觉如何？

translation.en: [man 1] It's an honor, sir.
translation.zh: 很荣幸！

translation.en: [Kennedy] Congratulations! How does it feel to be an All-American?
translation.zh: 恭喜 入选明星队感觉如何？

translation.en: [man 2] Very good, sir.
translation.zh: 非常好！

translation.en: Congratulations! How does it feel to be an All-American?
translation.zh: 恭喜 入选明星队感觉如何？

translation.en: [man 1] Very good, sir.
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: Congratulations. How do you feel?
translation.zh: 恭喜 你感觉如何？

translation.en: I got to pee.
translation.zh: 我要尿尿！

translation.en: [laughs] I believe he said he had to go pee.
translation.zh: 我相信他说他要尿尿

translation.en: [Forrest] Some time later, for no particular reason,
translation.zh: 不久以后因为某些原因

translation.en: somebody shot that nice young president when he was riding in his car.
translation.zh: 有人暗杀了这年轻的好总统 他当时在车上

translation.en: And a few years after that, somebody shot his little brother, too,
translation.zh: 又过了几年 又有人枪杀他弟弟

translation.en: only he was in a hotel kitchen.
translation.zh: 这次是在酒店厨房里

translation.en: Must be hard being brothers. I wouldn't know.
translation.zh: 做兄弟一定很难 我不知道

translation.en: Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯甘

translation.en: [Forrest] Now can you believe it?
translation.zh: 信不信由你 打了五年足球

translation.en: After only five years of playing football, I got a college degree.
translation.zh: 信不信由你 打了五年足球 我也得到了大学学位

translation.en: Congratulations, son.
translation.zh: 孩子 恭喜！

translation.en: [Forrest] Mama was so proud.
translation.zh: 妈觉得好光彩！

translation.en: Forrest, I'm so proud of you. Here, I'll hold this for you.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 我为你骄傲 来 我帮你拿毕业证书

translation.en: Congratulations, son.
translation.zh: 恭喜 孩子！

translation.en: Have you given any thought to your future?
translation.zh: 你为前途打算过吗？

translation.en: Thought?
translation.zh: 打算？

translation.en: Hello. I'm Forrest. Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: （美国陆军是青年最好的出路） 你好 我是弗勒斯 姓甘！

translation.en: Nobody gives a horse's shit who you are, pus ball!
translation.zh: 没有人在乎你是谁 混球！

translation.en: You're not even a low-life, scum-sucking maggot!
translation.zh: 你连闻臭屁都不配！

translation.en: Get your faggoty ass on the bus! You're in the Army now!
translation.zh: 快上车 娘娘腔！你现在入伍啦！

translation.en: [man 1] Seat's taken.
translation.zh: 这位子有人！

translation.en: Taken.
translation.zh: 有人坐！

translation.en: [Forrest] At first, it seemed like I made a mistake,
translation.zh: 从第一天入伍情况来看…

translation.en: seeing how it was only my induction day, and I was already getting yelled at.
translation.zh: 我选择错了 一到便被人骂

translation.en: You can sit down if you want to.
translation.zh: 你想坐就坐

translation.en: [Forrest] I didn't know who I might meet or what they might ask.
translation.zh: 我不知会遇见谁 会被问到什么

translation.en: You ever been on a real shrimp boat?
translation.zh: 你坐过虾船吗？

translation.en: No. But I been on a real big boat.
translation.zh: 没有 我坐过大船

translation.en: I'm talking about a shrimp-catching boat.
translation.zh: 我是说捕虾船

translation.en: I been working on shrimp boats all my life.
translation.zh: 我这辈子都在捕虾船上做工

translation.en: I started out on my uncle's boat, that's my mama's brother,
translation.zh: 我先在舅舅的船上 就是我妈的哥哥 那时我才九岁

translation.en: when I was about maybe nine.
translation.zh: 就是我妈的哥哥 那时我才九岁

translation.en: I was just looking into buying a boat of my own boat and got drafted.
translation.zh: 当我正要自己买船的时候 我就被征兵了

translation.en: My given name is Benjamin Buford Blue.
translation.zh: 我登记的全名是班杰明巴福布鲁

translation.en: People call me Bubba,
translation.zh: 人家都叫我巴布

translation.en: just like one of them old redneck boys. Can you believe that?
translation.zh: 跟南方人叫“老弟”同音 你相信吗？

translation.en: My name's Forrest Gump. People call me Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 我叫弗勒斯甘 人家叫我弗勒斯甘

translation.en: [Forrest] So, Bubba was from Bayou La Batre, Alabama,
translation.zh: 巴布是阿拉巴马州拉巴特人

translation.en: and his mama cooked shrimp.
translation.zh: 他妈妈是煮虾的

translation.en: And her mama before her cooked shrimp,
translation.zh: 他妈妈的妈妈也是煮虾的

translation.en: and her mama before her mama cooked shrimp, too.
translation.zh: 他外婆的妈妈还是煮虾的

translation.en: Bubba's family knew everything there was to know about the shrimping business.
translation.zh: 有关煮虾生意的事 巴布家无所不知

translation.en: I know everything there is to know about the shrimping business.
translation.zh: 虾子这一行我无所不知

translation.en: Matter of fact, I'm going into the shrimping business for myself after I get out of the Army.
translation.zh: 我退伍之后要做虾子生意

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: Gump! What's your sole purpose in this Army?
translation.zh: 阿甘 你从军的目的是什么

translation.en: To do whatever you tell me, Drill Sergeant!
translation.zh: 报告班长 目的是服从你！

translation.en: Goddammit, Gump, you're a goddamn genius!
translation.zh: 阿甘 你他妈真是天才！

translation.en: That's the most outstanding answer I've ever heard.
translation.zh: 第一次听到这么杰出的回答

translation.en: You must have a goddamn IQ of 160. You are goddamn gifted, Private Gump.
translation.zh: 你的智商起码有160 你他妈是天才 阿甘！

translation.en: Listen up, people!
translation.zh: 大家注意！

translation.en: [Forrest] Now for some reason, I fit in the Army
translation.zh: 因为某种原因 我在军中如鱼得水

translation.en: like one of them round pegs.
translation.zh: 我在军中如鱼得水

translation.en: It's not really hard.
translation.zh: 这也不难

translation.en: You just make your bed real neat, and remember to stand up straight,
translation.zh: 只要内务做整齐 立正背要直

translation.en: and always answer every question with, "Yes, Drill Sergeant."
translation.zh: 每次答话都要说 “是 班长”

translation.en: [drill sergeant] Is that clear?
translation.zh: 明白吗？

translation.en: [all] Yes, Drill Sergeant!
translation.zh: 是 班长！

translation.en: What you do is, you just drag your nets along the bottom.
translation.zh: 你只要沿河床收网

translation.en: On a good day, you can catch over 100 pounds of shrimp.
translation.zh: 好的话一天可以捕一百磅虾

translation.en: Everything goes all right,
translation.zh: 假如一切顺利

translation.en: two men shrimping ten hours,
translation.zh: 两个人捕十小时虾

translation.en: less what you spends on gas,
translation.zh: 扣除油料费…

translation.en: -you can-- -Done, Drill Sergeant!
translation.zh: 报告班长 完毕！

translation.en: Gump!
translation.zh: 阿甘！

translation.en: Why did you put that weapon together so quickly, Gump?
translation.zh: 你为何那么快就把枪组合起来？

translation.en: -You told me to, Drill Sergeant. -Jesus H. Christ.
translation.zh: 报告班长 你说要快的！ 天啊 这是最快的纪录

translation.en: This is a new company record.
translation.zh: 天啊 这是最快的纪录

translation.en: If it wouldn't be a waste of such a damn fine enlisted man,
translation.zh: 真是一块当兵的材料

translation.en: I'd recommend you for O.C.S., Private Gump.
translation.zh: 我真想推荐你进官校

translation.en: You are gonna be a general someday, Gump! Now disassemble your weapon and continue!
translation.zh: 阿甘 将来你会当将军 分解武器 继续操练！

translation.en: Anyway, like I was sayin', shrimp is the fruit of the sea.
translation.zh: 我说过虾是海产食物

translation.en: You can barbecue it, boil it, broil it, bake it, sauté it.
translation.zh: 可以烤、煮、烧、烘、炒

translation.en: There's, uh, shrimp kabobs, shrimp creole,
translation.zh: 有烤虾串、墨西哥烤虾

translation.en: shrimp gumbo, pan fried, deep fried, stir fried.
translation.zh: 虾浓汤、平锅煎、深炸、拌炸

translation.en: There's pineapple shrimp
translation.zh: 有凤梨虾、柠檬虾

translation.en: and lemon shrimp, coconut shrimp, pepper shrimp,
translation.zh: 有凤梨虾、柠檬虾 椰汁虾、胡椒虾

translation.en: shrimp soup, shrimp stew, shrimp salad,
translation.zh: 鲜汤虾、炖虾、凉拌虾

translation.en: shrimp and potatoes, shrimp burger, shrimp sandwich.
translation.zh: 芋泥虾、虾堡、虾三明治…

translation.en: That… that's about it.
translation.zh: 大概差不多了

translation.en: [Forrest] Nighttime in the Army is a lonely time.
translation.zh: 在军中夜里是很寂寞的

translation.en: We'd lay there in our bunks and I'd miss my mama,
translation.zh: 我们躺在铺上 我会想妈妈

translation.en: and I'd miss Jenny.
translation.zh: 也会想珍妮

translation.en: Hey, Gump. Get a load of the tits on her.
translation.zh: 阿甘 来看这个巨乳尤物

translation.en: [Forrest] Turns out Jenny had gotten into some trouble over some photos of her in her college sweater.
translation.zh: 原来是珍妮穿大学毛衣拍照…

translation.en: And she was thrown out of school.
translation.zh: 惹出了风波 因而被学校开除

translation.en: ♪ My baby does the hanky panky ♪
translation.zh: 我的爱人偷偷摸摸…

translation.en: [Forrest] But that wasn't a bad thing,
translation.zh: 却因祸得福

translation.en: 'cause a man who owns a theater in Memphis, Tennessee,
translation.zh: 因为孟菲斯城有个戏院老板

translation.en: saw those photos and offered Jenny a job singing in a show.
translation.zh: 见到那张照片后请她去唱歌

translation.en: The first chance I got,
translation.zh: 我一有机会…

translation.en: I took the bus up to Memphis to see her perform in that show.
translation.zh: 就坐公车去孟菲斯看她表演

translation.en: That was Amber, Amber Flame. Give her a big hand, guys! Good job, Amber!
translation.zh: 刚才表演的是“琥珀火焰” 大家给她鼓励

translation.en: And now, for your listening and viewing pleasure,
translation.zh: 现在为了满足视听

translation.en: direct from Hollywood, California, our very own beatnik beauty.
translation.zh: 特从加州好莱坞请到… 新潮性感美人

translation.en: Let's give a big round of applause to the luscious Bobbie Dylan.
translation.zh: 请热烈欢迎性感的鲍比狄伦

translation.en: -[man 1 laughing] -[man 2] All right.
translation.zh: 鲍比！

translation.en: ♪ How many roads must a man walk down ♪
translation.zh: 人要走过多少路

translation.en: ♪ Before you can call him a man? ♪
translation.zh: 才配称大丈夫

translation.en: ♪ Yes, and how many seas Must the white dove sail ♪
translation.zh: 白鸽要储存多少种子

translation.en: -[Forrest] Her dream had come true. -♪ Before she sleeps in the sand? ♪
translation.zh: 她的美梦成真

translation.en: [Forrest] She was a folksinger.
translation.zh: 她成了民谣歌手

translation.en: ♪ Yes, and how many times Must the cannonballs fly ♪
translation.zh: 炮弹要发射多少次

translation.en: -♪ Before they're forever banned? ♪ -[man 3] Come on, baby, shake it up. -Shake it up now. [man 4] Somebody get her a harmonica.
translation.zh: 才永远地停火

translation.en: -[all laughing] -♪ The answer, my friend ♪ -♪ Is blowin' in the wind ♪ -[man 6] This ain't Captain Kangaroo.
translation.zh: 朋友 答案随风飘去…

translation.en: [man 6] Hey, honey I got something here for you.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我有东西给你

translation.en: -[Jenny] Unbelievable! -Hey! Goddammit!
translation.zh: 可恶！

translation.en: -[all hooting] -Hey! Hey! You stupid jerk! -I'm singin' a song here. -[woman hooting]
translation.zh: 笨蛋 我在唱歌

translation.en: [Jenny] Polly, get out here!
translation.zh: 波利 快出来！

translation.en: Shut up yourselves! Just shut up!
translation.zh: 给我们看点“货色” 闭嘴！

translation.en: Forrest! What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 你来干什么？

translation.en: What are you doing? -[man 6] Hey! -[man 7] Aw!
translation.zh: 你干什么？

translation.en: -[Forrest] Come on. -What are you doing, Forrest? Let me down!
translation.zh: 你干什么？弗勒斯 放我下来

translation.en: You can't keep doing this, Forrest. You can't keep trying to rescue me all the time.
translation.zh: 你不能老是跑来帮我解围

translation.en: They was trying to grab you.
translation.zh: 他们要碰你

translation.en: [Jenny] A lot of people try to grab me.
translation.zh: 有许多人都想碰我

translation.en: Just-- You can't keep doing this all the time.
translation.zh: 你不能每一次都插手

translation.en: I can't help it. I love you.
translation.zh: 我忍不住 我爱你！

translation.en: Forrest… [sighs] …you don't know what love is.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 你不知道何谓爱

translation.en: You remember that time we prayed, Forrest?
translation.zh: 记得那一次我们祷告吗？

translation.en: We prayed for God to turn me into a bird so I could fly far, far away.
translation.zh: 我们求上帝把我变作小鸟 让我远走高飞

translation.en: Yes, I do.
translation.zh: 我记得！

translation.en: You think I could fly off this bridge?
translation.zh: 你认为我能飞离这座桥吗？

translation.en: What do you mean, Jenny?
translation.zh: 珍妮 什么意思？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: -I got to get out of here. -[vehicle approaching]
translation.zh: 我要离开这里

translation.en: [Forrest] Wait, Jenny.
translation.zh: 等一下…珍妮！

translation.en: Forrest, you stay away from me, okay? You just stay away from me, please.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 你离我远一点 拜托

translation.en: Can I have a ride?
translation.zh: 可以搭便车吗？

translation.en: -[cab driver] Where are you going? -I don't care.
translation.zh:
-要到哪去？
-无所谓

translation.en: -[cab driver] Get in the truck. -So bye-bye, Jenny.
translation.zh: 上车！ 再见 珍妮！

translation.en: They sending me to Vietnam.
translation.zh: 他们派我去越南

translation.en: It's this whole other country.
translation.zh: 那是另一个国家

translation.en: Just hang on a minute.
translation.zh: 等一下！

translation.en: Listen, you promise me something, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 你答应我一件事

translation.en: Just-- If you're ever in trouble, don't try to be brave.
translation.zh: 假如有麻烦你不要逞英雄

translation.en: You just run, okay? Just run away.
translation.zh: 你只管跑 好吗？只管跑！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的！

translation.en: Jenny.
translation.zh: 珍妮…

translation.en: I'll write you all the time.
translation.zh: 我会时常写信给你

translation.en: [Forrest] And just like that, she was gone.
translation.zh: 她就那样走了

translation.en: You come back safe to me. Do you hear?
translation.zh: 你给我平安的回来 听到没有

translation.en: [Forrest] Now they told us that Vietnam was going to be very different from the United States of America.
translation.zh: 他们说越南跟美国截然不同

translation.en: Except for all the beer cans and the barbecues, it was.
translation.zh: 除了都有啤酒和烤肉 两者的确不同

translation.en: Hey, I'll bet there's shrimp all in these waters.
translation.zh: 我敢打赌水里都是虾

translation.en: They tell me these Vietnams is good shrimp.
translation.zh: 听说越南人很会捕虾

translation.en: After we win this war and we take over everything,
translation.zh: 等我们打赢了要占领一切…

translation.en: we can get American shrimpers
translation.zh: 带美国的捕虾人来这里捕虾

translation.en: to come out here and shrimp these waters. And just shrimp all the time, man.
translation.zh: 带美国的捕虾人来这里捕虾 我们整天捕虾 虾多的是

translation.en: You must be my FNG's.
translation.zh: 你们是我的新兵

translation.en: -[Forrest] Morning, sir. -[Bubba] Morning, sir.
translation.zh: 长官早！

translation.en: Oh, get your hands down. Do not salute me.
translation.zh: 手放下 不要敬礼

translation.en: There are goddamn snipers all around this area who'd love to grease an officer.
translation.zh: 四周的狙击手很想干掉军官

translation.en: I'm Lieutenant Dan Taylor. Welcome to fort platoon.
translation.zh: 我是邓泰勒中尉 欢迎来第四排

translation.en: What's wrong with your lip?
translation.zh: 你的嘴唇怎么了？

translation.en: -I was born with big gums, sir. -Yeah? Well, you better tuck that in.
translation.zh: 我天生厚嘴唇 长官！ 最好缩进嘴里

translation.en: Gonna get that caught on a trip wire.
translation.zh: 免得拖地触动地雷

translation.en: Where are you boys from in the world?
translation.zh: 你们是哪里人？

translation.en: -[Forrest] Alabama, sir! -[Bubba] Alabama, sir!
translation.zh: 报告 阿拉巴马人

translation.en: You twins?
translation.zh: 你们是双胞胎？

translation.en: No. We are not relations, sir.
translation.zh: 不是 我们不是亲戚

translation.en: Look, it's pretty basic here.
translation.zh: 注意 规矩很简单

translation.en: You stick with me and learn from the guys who've been in country a while, you'll be all right.
translation.zh: 紧跟着我 向先来的人学习就没事了！

translation.en: There is one item of GI gear that can be the difference
translation.zh: 大兵只有一种区别

translation.en: between a live grunt and a dead grunt…
translation.zh: 就是活大兵与死大兵之别

translation.en: socks. Cushioned sole, OD green.
translation.zh: 穿袜子！ 鞋底有垫子 军绿色的 脚不要弄湿了

translation.en: Try and keep your feet dry. And when we're out humpin',
translation.zh: 鞋底有垫子 军绿色的 脚不要弄湿了

translation.en: I want you boys to remember to change your socks whenever we stop.
translation.zh: 每次巡逻休息时记得换袜子

translation.en: The Mekong will eat a grunt's feet right off his legs.
translation.zh: 湄公河会把大兵的脚咬掉

translation.en: Sergeant Sims. Goddammit, where's that sling rope I said to order?
translation.zh: 辛姆中士 该死！ 我叫你订的绳索呢？

translation.en: I put in the requisitions at battalion…
translation.zh: 我向营部申请了

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Well, you call those sons of bitches…
translation.zh: 好的 你再继续管那帮孙子们要

translation.en: [Forrest] Lieutenant Dan sure knew his stuff.
translation.zh: 邓中尉很在行

translation.en: I felt real lucky he was my lieutenant.
translation.zh: 遇到这种中尉是我的幸运

translation.en: He was from a long, great military tradition.
translation.zh: 他是军人世家出身

translation.en: Somebody in his family had fought and died…
translation.zh: 他的家族在每一场战争中…

translation.en: in every… single… American war.
translation.zh: 都有人殉国

translation.en: -Goddammit, kick some ass. -I'm on it, lieutenant.
translation.zh:
-该死 杀死几个敌人
-我正在找！

translation.en: Get on it!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: [Forrest] I guess you could say he had a lot to live up to.
translation.zh: 我想他是极其想要追上祖先

translation.en: So, you boys from Arkansas, huh? Well…
translation.zh: 原来你们是阿拉巴马人

translation.en: I been through there.
translation.zh: 我到过那地方

translation.en: Little Rock's a fine town.
translation.zh: 小岩城是个好地方

translation.en: Now, go shake down your gear. See the platoon sergeant. Draw what you need for the field.
translation.zh: 现在去架好装备 向排副领取巡逻要用的装备

translation.en: If you boys are hungry, we got steaks burning right over here.
translation.zh: 如果肚子饿 这边有烤牛排

translation.en: Two standing orders in this platoon--
translation.zh: 本排有几条不变的规定：

translation.en: One, take good care of your feet.
translation.zh: 第一 好好照顾你的脚

translation.en: Two, try not to do anything stupid, like getting yourself killed.
translation.zh: 第二 尽力不要做傻事 比方做找死的事

translation.en: I sure hope I don't let him down.
translation.zh: 希望我没令他失望

translation.en: [Forrest] I got to see a lot of the countryside.
translation.zh: 我看到许多乡下景色

translation.en: We would take these real long walks.
translation.zh: 我们会走很长的路

translation.en: [Forrest] And we were always lookin' for this guy named Charlie. ♪ There's too much confusion ♪
translation.zh: 我们一直在找叫查理的人

translation.en: -[soldier 1] Hold it up! -[soldier 2] Hold up, boys!
translation.zh: 停！

translation.en: [Forrest] It wasn't always fun.
translation.zh: 并不是都一直很好玩

translation.en: Lieutenant Dan was always getting these funny feelings
translation.zh: 邓中尉总是草木皆兵

translation.en: about a rock or a trail or the road,
translation.zh: 对一块岩石一条小径 都会起疑

translation.en: so he'd tell us to… [imitates Dan] "Get down, shut up."
translation.zh: 他叫我们伏身、闭嘴！

translation.en: Get down! Shut up!
translation.zh: 伏身！闭嘴！

translation.en: [Forrest whispers] So we did.
translation.zh: 我照着做了

translation.en: Now I don't know much about anything,
translation.zh: 我对任何事都不很了解

translation.en: but I think some of America's best young men served in this war.
translation.zh: 但我想军中有些最优秀的青年

translation.en: There was Dallas from Phoenix.
translation.zh: 有达拉斯 凤凰城人

translation.en: Cleveland, he was from Detroit.
translation.zh: 克利夫兰 他是底特律人

translation.en: [whispers] Hey, Tex.
translation.zh: 德克斯！

translation.en: Hey, Tex. Man, what the hell's going on?
translation.zh: 德克斯！ 兄弟 怎么回事？

translation.en: [Forrest] And Tex was--
translation.zh: 还有德克斯

translation.en: Well, I don't remember where Tex come from.
translation.zh: 不过我想不起他是哪里人了

translation.en: [Dan] Ah, nothing.
translation.zh: 没事！

translation.en: Fourth platoon, on your feet.
translation.zh: 第四排 起立！

translation.en: Y'all got ten clicks to go to that river.
translation.zh: 离那条河还有十公里

translation.en: Move out. -["Soul Kitchen" playing] -[soldiers chanting]
translation.zh: 我们出发！

translation.en: [Dan] Step it up! Look alive out there.
translation.zh: 注意 出发！打起精神！

translation.en: [Forrest] The good thing about Vietnam is there was always someplace to go.
translation.zh: 越南的好处是总有地方可去

translation.en: Fire in the hole!
translation.zh: 坑里要爆炸了！

translation.en: Gump, check out that hole.
translation.zh: 阿甘 检查坑里！

translation.en: [Forrest] And there was always something to do.
translation.zh: 而且总是有事可做

translation.en: -[Dan] Mount 'em up! -[soldier 1] Spread out! Cover his back!
translation.zh: 把他们堆起来 散开 掩护他背后

translation.en: [Forrest] One day it started raining, and it didn't quit for four months.
translation.zh: 有一天下起雨来 一下就是四个月没停

translation.en: We've been through every kind of rain there is,
translation.zh: 我们经历了这里的各种雨

translation.en: little bitty stinging rain…
translation.zh: 有绵绵细雨

translation.en: and big ol' fat rain,
translation.zh: 有瓢泼大雨

translation.en: rain that flew in sideways,
translation.zh: 有横扫的暴雨

translation.en: and sometimes rain even seemed to come straight up from underneath.
translation.zh: 还有那种像是从下面往上走的雨

translation.en: Shoot, it even rained at night.
translation.zh: 甚至还有晚上的雨

translation.en: -[Bubba] Hey, Forrest. -[Forrest] Hey, Bubba.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 巴布

translation.en: I'm gon' to lean up against you. You lean your back against me.
translation.zh: 我要背靠你 你也背靠我

translation.en: This way we don't have to sleep with our heads in the mud.
translation.zh: 这样我们不必睡在泥里

translation.en: You know why we're a good partnership, Forrest?
translation.zh: 可知我们为什么是好搭档？

translation.en: 'cause we be watching out for one another, like brothers and stuff.
translation.zh: 因为我们会彼此照应 像骨肉弟兄

translation.en: Hey, Forrest, somethin' I been thinking about.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 我在想一些事

translation.en: I got a very important question to ask you.
translation.zh: 有句重要的话要问你

translation.en: How would you like to go into the shrimping business with me?
translation.zh: 你想不想跟我做虾生意？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: Man, I tell you what. I got it all figured out, too.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我都计算过了

translation.en: So many pounds of shrimp will pay off the boat.
translation.zh: 要捕多少虾偿付买船的钱

translation.en: So many pounds for gas.
translation.zh: 要多少虾付油钱

translation.en: We can just live right on the boat. We ain't got to pay no rent.
translation.zh: 我们可以住在船上节省房租

translation.en: I'll be the captain. We can just work it together,
translation.zh: 我当船长 我们一起打拼

translation.en: split everything right down the middle. Man, I'm telling you, 50-50.
translation.zh: 一切都是你我平分

translation.en: And hey, Forrest, all the shrimp you can eat.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 还有吃不完的虾

translation.en: That's a fine idea.
translation.zh: 这个主意很好！

translation.en: [Forrest] Bubba did have a fine idea.
translation.zh: 巴布的主意是很好！

translation.en: [Forrest] I even wrote Jenny and told her all about it.
translation.zh: 我还写信告诉了珍妮

translation.en: I sent her letters. Not every day, but almost.
translation.zh: 我没有每天给她写信 但几乎天天都写

translation.en: I told her what I was doin' and asked her what she was doin'
translation.zh: 把我所做的告诉她 也问她做什么

translation.en: and told her how I thought about her always.
translation.zh: 把我所做的告诉她 也问她做什么 还告诉她 我一直想她

translation.en: And how I was looking forward to getting a letter from her
translation.zh: 还有我多么盼望她来信

translation.en: -just as soon as she had the time. -[dog barking]
translation.zh: 请她一有空就写

translation.en: [Forrest] I'd always let her know that I was okay.
translation.zh: 我总是让她知道我没事

translation.en: Then I'd sign each letter "Love, Forrest Gump."
translation.zh: 每封信都写着 “爱你的弗勒斯甘上”

translation.en: [Forrest] This one day, we was out walking like always,
translation.zh: 有一天我们跟平常一样巡逻

translation.en: and then, just like that,
translation.zh: 忽然间雨停了 好像有人关掉了水龙头

translation.en: somebody turned off the rain, and the sun come out.
translation.zh: 忽然间雨停了 好像有人关掉了水龙头 太阳钻了出来！

translation.en: -[shots firing] -[Dan] Ambush!
translation.zh: 伏身 弗勒斯！

translation.en: Take cover!
translation.zh: 找掩护！

translation.en: -[Dan] Get that pig up here, goddammit! -Forrest! You okay?
translation.zh: 把机枪提上来 弗勒斯 你要紧吗？

translation.en: Strongarm, Strongarm!
translation.zh: 呼叫强火 有情况…

translation.en: Hey, Dan! We got a man down!
translation.zh: 医护兵 有人伤亡！

translation.en: [Dan] Strongarm, this is Leg Lima 6! Over!
translation.zh: 强火 利马六呼叫 请回答

translation.en: Roger, Strongarm! Be advised we have incoming
translation.zh: 强火 树林界限蓝点方向…

translation.en: from the tree line at point blue plus two! A.K.s and rockets!
translation.zh: 有机枪火箭攻击！

translation.en: -[soldier 1] We're getting it hard! -[soldier 2] Misfire! Misfire!
translation.zh: 没有打中！

translation.en: -[bombs approaching, exploding] -Goddammit!
translation.zh: 可恶！

translation.en: They got us, and it hurt.
translation.zh: 天啊 我的小队伤亡惨重

translation.en: We're going to move 'em back to the blue line.
translation.zh: 天啊 我的小队伤亡惨重 退到蓝线 利马六通话完毕

translation.en: Pull back! Pull back!
translation.zh: 撤退！ 弗勒斯！跑！

translation.en: Forrest! Run, Forrest!
translation.zh: 弗勒斯！跑！

translation.en: -Pull back! -Run! Run! Run, man! -Run! -[Dan] Pull back, Gump!
translation.zh:
-撤退！
-弗勒斯 跑！

translation.en: Run, goddammit! Run! Get the hell out of here!
translation.zh: 跑 该死的 跑！

translation.en: [Forrest] I ran and ran just like Jenny told me to.
translation.zh: 我拼命的跑 像珍妮教我的

translation.en: I ran so far so fast that pretty soon I was all by myself,
translation.zh: 我跑得又快又远 于是偏离了大队 那样不好

translation.en: which was a bad thing.
translation.zh: 于是偏离了大队 那样不好

translation.en: Bubba.
translation.zh: 巴布！

translation.en: [Forrest] Bubba was my best good friend. I had to make sure he was okay.
translation.zh: 巴布是我的好友 我要他平安

translation.en: -[soldier] Keep running down there. -[Forrest panting]
translation.zh: 有朋友在外面吗？

translation.en: Where the hell are you?
translation.zh: 你在哪里？

translation.en: Bubba!
translation.zh: 巴布？

translation.en: And on my way back to find Bubba,
translation.zh: 我回去找巴布的路上

translation.en: well, there was this boy laying on the ground.
translation.zh: 看见一个弟兄倒在地上

translation.en: Tex.
translation.zh: 德克斯！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好…

translation.en: [Forrest] I couldn't let him lay there all alone, scared the way he was,
translation.zh: 我不能任由他躺在那里 吓成那样

translation.en: -so I grabbed him up… -[Tex groaning] [Forrest] …and run him out of there.
translation.zh: 于是我抓起他就跑

translation.en: [Forrest] And every time I went back looking for Bubba,
translation.zh: 而我每次回去找巴布…

translation.en: somebody else was saying, "Help me, Forrest, help me!"
translation.zh: 总是有人喊“弗勒斯 救我”

translation.en: Okay. Here. Here.
translation.zh: 听不到…

translation.en: Don't sweat, man. Just lay back. You'll be okay. You'll be okay.
translation.zh: 别怕兄弟 躺下 你不要紧的

translation.en: I started to get scared that I might never find Bubba.
translation.zh: 我开始害怕会找不到巴布 你靠近敌人 空中支援有危险

translation.en: I know my position is danger close!
translation.zh: 强火 我知道离敌人太近

translation.en: We got Charlie all over this area.
translation.zh: 四周都是查理（越共）

translation.en: I got to have those fast movers in here now. Over.
translation.zh: 我要喷射机来支援

translation.en: [grunts] Lieutenant Dan, Coleman's dead!
translation.zh: 强火呼叫 我们要… 邓中尉 柯曼死了！

translation.en: I know he's dead! My whole goddamn platoon is wiped out!
translation.zh: 我知道他死了 我这一排都被消灭了

translation.en: -[sobs] Goddammit! -[indistinct chatter radio]
translation.zh:
-利马六 听到没有 请回答
-可恶！

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你干什么？

translation.en: You leave me here! Get away. Just leave me here! Get out!
translation.zh: 别管我 快走！别管我！ 利马六 强火呼叫 听到没有？

translation.en: [groans, screams] God, I said leave me here, goddammit!
translation.zh: 利马六 强火呼叫 听到没有？ 真要命 我叫你别管我！

translation.en: [man] Leg Lima 6, Leg Lima 6 this is Strongarm.
translation.zh: 利马六 强火呼叫

translation.en: Be advised your fast movers are inbound at this time. Over.
translation.zh: 你要求的喷射机赶来了

translation.en: [Forrest] Then it felt like somethin' just jumped up and bit me.
translation.zh: 然后好像有东西跳起咬我

translation.en: -[screams] Something bit me! -[Dan groans]
translation.zh: 有东西咬我

translation.en: You dang son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 孙子越共！

translation.en: I can't leave the platoon. I told you to leave me there, Gump.
translation.zh: 我不能丢下我的排 我叫你别管我 你自己逃命

translation.en: -Forget about me. Get yourself out! -[bombs exploding]
translation.zh: 我叫你别管我 你自己逃命

translation.en: Did you hear what I said?
translation.zh: 你听到没有 可恶！

translation.en: Gump, damn it, put me down.
translation.zh: 你听到没有 可恶！ 放我下来 你快走！

translation.en: Get your ass out of here. [groans]
translation.zh: 放我下来 你快走！

translation.en: I didn't ask you to pull me out of there, god damn, you--
translation.zh: 我没叫你把我拉走 你该死

translation.en: -Where the hell do you think you're going? -To get Bubba.
translation.zh:
-你要上哪去？
-去救巴布！

translation.en: [Dan] I got an air strike inbound right now. They're gonna nape the whole area.
translation.zh: 支援马上要轰炸 投凝固汽油弹

translation.en: Gump, you stay here! Goddammit! That's an order.
translation.zh: 阿甘 留下来 这是命令！

translation.en: I gotta find Bubba!
translation.zh: 我必须找到巴布

translation.en: Forrest.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯

translation.en: -Bubba. -I'm okay, Forrest.
translation.zh: 巴布 我没事 弗勒斯

translation.en: I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: [hesitating] Oh… oh, Bubba, no.
translation.zh: 巴布…不…

translation.en: [Bubba] I'll be all right.
translation.zh: 我不会有事的！

translation.en: -Come on. Come on. Come on. -[Bubba groaning]
translation.zh: 来！过来！

translation.en: [groaning] I'm okay, Forrest. -[airplanes approaching] -[groans] I'm okay, Forrest. I'm fine. [groans]
translation.zh: 我不要紧 弗勒斯 我没事

translation.en: [Dan] Top smoke. Get it up there.
translation.zh: 直升机来了 放烟幕信号

translation.en: [Forrest] If I'd have known this was gonna be the last time me and Bubba was gonna talk,
translation.zh: 我若知道那是和巴布最后交谈

translation.en: I'd of thought of something better to say.
translation.zh: 我会讲好听一点的

translation.en: Hey, Bubba.
translation.zh: 巴布！

translation.en: Forrest… why did this happen?
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 怎么会这样？

translation.en: [Forrest] You got shot.
translation.zh: 你中枪了！

translation.en: Then Bubba said something I won't ever forget.
translation.zh: 然后巴布说了我一生难忘的话

translation.en: I want to go home.
translation.zh: 我想回家

translation.en: [Forrest] Bubba was my best good friend.
translation.zh: 巴布本是我最好的朋友

translation.en: And even I know that ain't something you can find just around the corner.
translation.zh: 连我都明白好朋友不是随便拣来的

translation.en: Bubba was gonna be a shrimping boat captain,
translation.zh: 巴布本来想当捕虾船长

translation.en: but instead, he died right there by that river in Vietnam.
translation.zh: 巴布本来想当捕虾船长 却死在越南的河边

translation.en: That's all I have to say about that.
translation.zh: 这件事我说到此为止

translation.en: It was a bullet, wasn't it?
translation.zh: 那是一颗子弹 是吗？

translation.en: A bullet? That jumped up and bit you.
translation.zh:
-子弹？
-跳起来咬你的

translation.en: Oh. Yes, sir. Bit me directly in the buttocks.
translation.zh: 是！一口咬在屁股上

translation.en: They said it was a million-dollar wound but…
translation.zh: 他们说这个伤价值连城

translation.en: the Army must keep that money 'cause I still ain't seen
translation.zh: 钱一定被军方扣住了

translation.en: a nickel of that million dollars.
translation.zh: 因为我一毛钱也没见到

translation.en: The only good thing about being wounded in the buttocks is the ice cream.
translation.zh: 屁股受伤的好处 是有冰淇淋吃

translation.en: They gave me all the ice cream I could eat.
translation.zh: 而且让我随便吃 爱吃多少吃多少

translation.en: And guess what? A good friend of mine was in the bed right next door.
translation.zh: 还有更好的事 邻床的伤兵是我的好朋友

translation.en: Lieutenant Dan, I got you some ice cream.
translation.zh: 邓中尉 我带了冰淇淋给你

translation.en: Lieutenant Dan, ice cream!
translation.zh: 邓中尉 冰淇淋！

translation.en: [nurse] It's time for your bath, lieutenant.
translation.zh: 中尉 洗澡了！

translation.en: Harper!
translation.zh: 哈伯！

translation.en: [soldier] Cooper. Larson.
translation.zh: 古柏！赖森！

translation.en: Webster. Gump.
translation.zh: 韦斯特…甘…甘

translation.en: -Gump! -I'm Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 我是弗勒斯甘

translation.en: [soldier] Kyle. Nichols.
translation.zh: 凯尔…尼可斯…

translation.en: Mcmill.
translation.zh: （收件人珍妮克伦 查无此人）

translation.en: [man over TV] Surprise, surprise, surprise!
translation.zh: 惊奇！

translation.en: Gump, how can you watch that stupid shit? Turn it off.
translation.zh: 阿甘 那玩意你怎么看得下去 关掉！

translation.en: [announcer] You are tuned to the American Forces Vietnam Network.
translation.zh: 从非军事区到湄公河三角洲 美军越南电视网 第六频道

translation.en: This is Channel 6, Saigon.
translation.zh: 美军越南电视网 第六频道

translation.en: -[soldier] Good catch, Gump. -[ball bounces]
translation.zh: 接得好 阿甘！

translation.en: You know how to play this?
translation.zh: 你会打吗？

translation.en: Come on. Let me show you. Here.
translation.zh: 来 我教你！

translation.en: Now, the secret to this game is, no matter what happens,
translation.zh: 诀窍就在于无论如何…

translation.en: never, ever… take your eye off the ball.
translation.zh: 眼睛盯着球别放松

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 来！

translation.en: [Forrest] For some reason, ping-pong came very natural to me.
translation.zh: 不知为何我是打乒乓球的料

translation.en: See? Any idiot can play.
translation.zh: 你看 白痴也会打

translation.en: [Forrest] So I started playing it all the time.
translation.zh: 于是我经常打乒乓球

translation.en: I played ping-pong even when I didn't have anyone to play ping-pong with.
translation.zh: 甚至于没有对手我也打

translation.en: [Forrest] The hospital's people said it made me look like a duck in water,
translation.zh: 医院里的人说我如鱼得水

translation.en: whatever that means.
translation.zh: 管它什么意思

translation.en: Even Lieutenant Dan would come and watch me play.
translation.zh: 连邓中尉也来看我打球

translation.en: I played ping-pong so much, I even played it in my sleep.
translation.zh: 我打得太多连做梦也在打球

translation.en: [breathes heavily] Now, you listen to me. We all have a destiny.
translation.zh: 你听我说 人的命运早已注定

translation.en: Nothing just happens. It's all part of a plan!
translation.zh: 没有一件是巧合 都有安排

translation.en: I should have died out there with my men,
translation.zh: 我应该和部下一起战死

translation.en: but now I'm nothing but a goddamn cripple,
translation.zh: 却变成无用的残废

translation.en: a legless freak! Look. Look! Look at me!
translation.zh: 没腿的怪物！你看我！

translation.en: You see that? Do you know what it's like not to be able to use your legs?
translation.zh: 看到没有？ 可知道不能用腿的感觉？

translation.en: W… y… y… yes, sir, I do.
translation.zh: 这…是 长官 我了解！

translation.en: Did you hear what I said? [breathes heavily]
translation.zh: 你听到我的话没有？

translation.en: You cheated me!
translation.zh: 你坑了我！

translation.en: I had a destiny. I was supposed to die in the field
translation.zh: 我命中注定要死在战场上

translation.en: with honor!
translation.zh: 光荣地战死 那是我的命运

translation.en: That was my destiny, and you… cheated me out of it!
translation.zh: 光荣地战死 那是我的命运 你把我拐了出来！

translation.en: Do you understand what I'm saying, Gump?
translation.zh: 阿甘 你懂我的话吗？

translation.en: This wasn't supposed to happen-- Not to me.
translation.zh: 这不该发生 不该发生在我身上

translation.en: I had a destiny. [pants]
translation.zh: 我命中注定

translation.en: I was… Lieutenant… Dan Taylor.
translation.zh: 该是邓泰勒中尉

translation.en: [hesitates] Y… you still Lieutenant Dan.
translation.zh: 你仍然是邓中尉

translation.en: Look at me.
translation.zh: 你看我！

translation.en: What am I gonna do now? [panting]
translation.zh: 我现在能做什么？

translation.en: What am I gonna do now?
translation.zh: 我能做什么？

translation.en: PFC Gump?
translation.zh: 一等兵阿甘？

translation.en: Yes, sir!
translation.zh: 是 长官！

translation.en: As you were.
translation.zh: 稍息！

translation.en: Son, you been awarded the Medal of Honor.
translation.zh: 孩子 你得到了勋章

translation.en: Guess what, Lieutenant Dan. They want to give me a Med--
translation.zh: 邓中尉 他们要给我勋章

translation.en: Ma'am. What'd they do with Lieutenant Dan?
translation.zh: 小姐 他们把邓中尉怎么了

translation.en: They sent him home.
translation.zh: 送他回家了

translation.en: [Forrest] Two weeks later, I left Vietnam.
translation.zh: 两周以后我离开越南

translation.en: The ceremony was kicked off with a candid speech by the president
translation.zh: 总统以恳切的演说开启序幕

translation.en: regarding the need for further escalation of the war in Vietnam.
translation.zh: 宣示越战队员有升级的必要

translation.en: President Johnson awarded four Medals of Honor to men
translation.zh: 约翰逊总统授勋 赠与各军种的四位战士

translation.en: from each of the armed services.
translation.zh: 赠与各军种的四位战士

translation.en: America owes you a debt of gratitude, son.
translation.zh: 孩子 国家感激你！

translation.en: I understand you were wounded. Where were you hit?
translation.zh: 我知道你受过伤 伤在哪里

translation.en: In the buttocks, sir.
translation.zh: 在屁股上 总统！

translation.en: Well, that must be a sight. [whispers] I'd kinda like to see that.
translation.zh: 那一定很可观！我真想看看！

translation.en: ♪ God bless you, please, Mrs. Robinson ♪
translation.zh: 好家伙！

translation.en: [Forrest] After that, Mama went to the hotel to lay down,
translation.zh: 颁勋之后妈回到饭店休息

translation.en: so I went out for a walk to see our nation's capital.
translation.zh: 我出去逛我们的首都

translation.en: [Isabel] Hilary, all right, I've got the vets,
translation.zh: 希拉里 我找到退伍军人了

translation.en: What do you want me to do with them? What are you doing here so late?
translation.zh: 要我怎么处理？

translation.en: [Forrest] It's a good thing Mama was resting,
translation.zh: 幸好妈休息了

translation.en: 'cause the streets was awful crowded with people
translation.zh: 因为街上挤满了人

translation.en: lookin' at all the statues and monuments,
translation.zh: 瞻仰铜像 观赏纪念物

translation.en: and some of them people were loud and pushy.
translation.zh: 有些人喧哗推挤

translation.en: Okay, follow me! Come on, let's move it out!
translation.zh: 好 跟我来！快！ 出发！

translation.en: [Forrest] Everywhere I went, I had to stand in line.
translation.zh: 我到哪里都要排队

translation.en: [Hilary] Stay here.
translation.zh: 站在这里！

translation.en: Hey, you're a good man for doing this. Good!
translation.zh: 你做这种事是好人

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的！

translation.en: [Forrest] There was this man giving a little talk.
translation.zh: 有一个男子讲了几句话

translation.en: And for some reason, he was wearing an American flag for a shirt.
translation.zh: 他因某种原因穿国旗衬衫

translation.en: [Abbie] I'm gonna bring up some soldiers…
translation.zh: 现在我要请几位军人来谈战争

translation.en: [Forrest] And he liked to say the "f-word" a lot. "F" this and "f" that.
translation.zh: 他喜欢说“干”字 干这干那

translation.en: And every time he said the "F" word,
translation.zh: 他每次“干”的时候

translation.en: people, for some reason, well, they'd cheer.
translation.zh: 人们因某种原因欢呼起来

translation.en: -[feedback screeching] -[cheering]
translation.zh: 这些人叫约翰逊 拿战争“干”他自己

translation.en: -[Abbie] Yeah! Yeah! Yeah! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 这些人叫约翰逊 拿战争“干”他自己 好！

translation.en: Come on, man. Come up here, man.
translation.zh: 来 上来！兄弟…

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Yeah, you! Come on. Move, move, move!
translation.zh: 来！…上来！

translation.en: You can do it. Just get up there. Go on. That's it.
translation.zh: 快！…上来！

translation.en: Tell us a little bit about the war, man.
translation.zh: 跟我们谈一谈战争

translation.en: The war in Vietnam?
translation.zh: 越南的战争？

translation.en: The war in Viet-fucking-Nam!
translation.zh: 妈的越战！

translation.en: Well… [Forrest] There was only one thing I could say about the war in Vietnam.
translation.zh: 这…对越战我只有一句话

translation.en: there's only one thing I can say about… the war in Vietnam.
translation.zh: 对越战我只有一句话

translation.en: In Vietnam… -your-- -[feedback screeching]
translation.zh: 在越南 你的…

translation.en: -What the hell are you do-- -I'll beat your head in,
translation.zh: 你干什么？

translation.en: you goddamn oinker!
translation.zh: 我打烂你猪脑袋！

translation.en: Jesus Christ! What'd did they do with this?
translation.zh: 天啊 他们做了什么手脚？

translation.en: [man 1] We can't hear you!
translation.zh: 我们听不见

translation.en: [man 2] Can't hear anything!
translation.zh: 什么也听不见

translation.en: -[woman 1] Oh, man! -[Hilary] This… this one! Give me that!
translation.zh: 什么也听不见 这个！这个给我！

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 对了

translation.en: …And that's all I have to say about that.
translation.zh: 那就是我要说的

translation.en: That's so right on, man. You said it all.
translation.zh: 兄弟 一针见血！ 都让你道尽了 你叫什么名字

translation.en: What's your name, man?
translation.zh: 都让你道尽了 你叫什么名字

translation.en: My name is Forrest. Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 我叫弗勒斯 姓甘！

translation.en: Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 弗勒斯甘！

translation.en: [crowd] Gump!
translation.zh: 弗勒斯甘！

translation.en: Forrest! [Jenny] Forrest!
translation.zh: 弗勒斯！

translation.en: Jenny! [Jenny] Forrest!
translation.zh:
-珍妮
-弗勒斯

translation.en: [Forrest] It was the happiest moment of my life.
translation.zh: 那是我一生最快乐的时刻

translation.en: [Forrest] Jenny and me were just like peas and carrots again.
translation.zh: 珍妮和我又像秤不离砣了

translation.en: [Forrest] She showed me around
translation.zh: 她带我观光

translation.en: and even introduced me to some of her new friends.
translation.zh: 还把我介绍给她的朋友们

translation.en: Shut that blind, man! And get your white ass away from that window.
translation.zh: 拉上百叶窗 离开窗口！

translation.en: Don't you know we in a war here?
translation.zh: 你不知道我们在打仗吗？

translation.en: Hey, man. He's cool. He's one of us.
translation.zh: 伙计 他没问题 是自己人

translation.en: -Let me tell you about us. -Where the hell have you been?
translation.zh:
-我来介绍
-你上哪去了？

translation.en: Our purpose here is to protect our black leaders
translation.zh: 我们目的是保护黑人领袖们

translation.en: from the racial onslaught of the pig who wishes to brutalize our black leaders,
translation.zh: 不受种族歧视者的攻击

translation.en: rape our women, and destroy our black communities.
translation.zh: 不让妇女被强暴 社区被毁坏

translation.en: Who's the baby killer?
translation.zh: 这个杀婴凶手是谁？

translation.en: This is my good friend I told you about. This is Forrest Gump.
translation.zh: 这是我跟你提过的好友弗勒斯甘

translation.en: Forrest, this is Wesley.
translation.zh: 这是卫斯理

translation.en: Wesley and I lived together in Berkeley,
translation.zh: 他和我在柏克利同住

translation.en: and he's the president of the Berkeley chapter of SDS.
translation.zh: 他是学生民主社会党主席

translation.en: Let me tell you something else. We are here to offer protection
translation.zh: 我再告诉你一件事 我们是来保护需要帮助的人

translation.en: and help for all those who need our help,
translation.zh: 我们是来保护需要帮助的人

translation.en: because we, the black panthers, are against the war in Vietnam.
translation.zh: 因为黑豹党反对打越战

translation.en: Yes. We are against any war where black soldiers are sent to the front line to die for a country that hates them.
translation.zh: 反对黑人为美国打仗 只因美国恨他们

translation.en: Yes. We are against any war where black soldiers go to fight
translation.zh: 我们反对黑人打任何仗

translation.en: and come to be brutalized and killed in their own communities. as they sleep in their beds at night.
translation.zh: 为国打仗回来却被歧视者 杀死在自己的社区

translation.en: Yes, we are against these racist and imperial dog acts.
translation.zh: 我们反对种族歧视

translation.en: [Jenny screams] Forrest! Quit it! Quit it!
translation.zh: 弗勒斯 住手！…

translation.en: Forrest!
translation.zh: 弗勒斯！

translation.en: -[Wesley groaning] -Stop it! Stop it!
translation.zh: 住手！

translation.en: I shouldn't have brought you here.
translation.zh: 天啊 我不该带你来

translation.en: I should have known it was gonna be some bullshit hassle!
translation.zh: 我早该知道你麻烦

translation.en: He should not be hitting you, Jenny.
translation.zh: 他不该打你 珍妮！

translation.en: Come on, Forrest.
translation.zh: 走 弗勒斯！

translation.en: Sorry I had a fight in the middle of your Black Panther party.
